chat_transcript: Chat Started: Tuesday, March 14, 2023, 14:23:18 (-0700) Chat Origin: ShopEasy Support Chat Agent Sarah (3s) Agent Sarah: Hi, thanks for contacting ShopEasy Support. This is Sarah, how can I assist you? (28s) Customer: Hi, my headphones from order #SE-5623 arrived but the left side isn't working. (45s) Agent Sarah: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I have your email to look up the order? (1m 2s) Customer: jason.lee@email.com (1m 35s) Agent Sarah: Thanks Jason, I see the order here. Since it's within the 30-day return window, we can either replace or refund. Which would you prefer? (2m 8s) Customer: I'd prefer a replacement, please. (2m 54s) Agent Sarah: Got it, I've placed a replacement order #SE-5631. You'll get an email with the return label for the defective unit. (3m 12s) Customer: Thank you, that's really helpful. (3m 28s) Agent Sarah: You're welcome! Anything else I can do for you today? (3m 41s) Customer: No, that's it. Appreciate your help! (3m 55s) Agent Sarah: Anytime, have a good day!

Chat Started: Friday, March 17, 2023, 10:45:33 (-0700) Chat Origin: ShopEasy Support Chat Agent Daniel (5s) Agent Daniel: Hello, welcome to ShopEasy! I'm Daniel. How can I help today? (22s) Customer: Hi, I need to change the shipping address for order #SE-5708. (38s) Agent Daniel: Sure thing. May I have your account email? (54s) Customer: priya.kapoor@email.com (1m 18s) Agent Daniel: Thanks Priya. I see your order is still in 'Processing', so we can update the shipping. What's the new address? (1m 42s) Customer: 24 Maple Avenue, Boston, MA 02110 (2m 25s) Agent Daniel: Got it, I've updated the shipping address successfully. Your package will now be sent there. (2m 38s) Customer: Great, thank you! (2m 52s) Agent Daniel: My pleasure. You'll also get an email confirmation of this change. Anything else today? (3m 5s) Customer: Nope, that's all. (3m 18s) Agent Daniel: Have a wonderful day!

Chat Started: Monday, March 20, 2023, 16:12:45 (-0700) Chat Origin: ShopEasy Support Chat Agent Emma (4s) Agent Emma: Hi, thanks for reaching out to ShopEasy. I'm Emma, what can I help you with? (31s) Customer: Hello, I just received order #SE-5789 but one of the coffee mugs is chipped. (48s) Agent Emma: Oh no, sorry about that! Can I have your email to check your account? (1m 9s) Customer: andrew.martin@email.com (1m 44s) Agent Emma: Thanks Andrew, I see the order. I can send you a replacement mug at no cost, or refund the item price of $12.99. Which would you prefer? (2m 15s) Customer: Replacement please, I'd like the full set. (3m 2s) Agent Emma: Done! A replacement mug will ship out today. You'll receive tracking details via email. (3m 18s) Customer: That's great, thanks for fixing this quickly. (3m 32s) Agent Emma: Happy to help! Anything else? (3m 44s) Customer: No, that covers it. (3m 58s) Agent Emma: Have a great rest of your day!
